content.detailedDescription: A friend and myself were standing on my deck at approx. 9pm. when i noticed an orange orb travelling horizontally moving eastward. it disappeared behind a tree line and we lost sight when another came into sight from where the first had been spotted. this one also moved in the same flight pattern at about the same height and speed as the first. there was no variation in the speed or intensity of the light and it too passed behind the treelike and out of visual. it was then i went for my camera and sure enough a third orb came from the same area and followed the same flight path before disappearing behind the tree line. i ran to the other side of the deck where i could see the orb had changed direction and was moving south.
content.summary: 3 orange, glowing orbs moved silently across the horizon before changing direction and moving south. each was approx. the same altitude and spaced evenly apart. approx. 30 sec.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were walking home from downtown riverside, ca. at approximately 10:05am, i looked up and saw a round white orb floating/hovering in the sky over mt.Rubidoux...Just a little to the right of a small dead tree on the side of the mountain. to be honest, i was just planning to look at the mountain as i have a thing for mountains. i looked at it for a moment and finally told my friend to look up as the object appeared to just be hovering.  after about 20 seconds i decided to pull out my kodak play sport camera...That i always carry with me as i love to take pictures of my surroundings. i started filming; however, i did not have my glasses on and could not see anything through my view finder, thus i only took a 19 second video clip from this vantage point.  the friend i was with suggested, i take still photos rather than video (which can be heard on the video) and then look at them when i get home to see what the object is by zooming in on the object if i actually got it in the picture frame. at first, i thought...Maybe it is a star...But i love looking into the sky at daytime and night time and i have never seen a star in this location at this time during the day.  due to the brightness, maybe it could be a meteor...But this had no tail, nor did it appear to be moving.  then the idea of a plane was in my mind...But again...This object was hovering...It was not flying in any direction when i first started my observation.  eventually, i thought it could be a balloon...But again...The object just hovered....It did not move up or down nor did it move side to side...It was stationary for at least 10 minutes.  i then thought...Maybe it is a weather balloon...But again...It did not move and it appeared to be too low for this type of activity.  additionally, the object was too high to be a hot air balloon.  the object itself over the 40 minute time frame appeared to be round but could change shape to triangle,square or diamond shape.  now over the next 40 minutes, my friend and i walked from mt. rubidoux across the bridge and to a fast food place (baker's) on mission blvd and up to limonite.  during that walk, i took 12 still pictures from different locations and 2 separate videos...One being 19 seconds long and the other being 39 seconds long.  i personally would have watched this object even longer and taken more photos and videos if my friend was not wanting so much to get home before the heat became unbearable...After all, we were on a 6 mile walk. yet in the time we did look at this object it did eventually move northward very slowly...In fact, we went into baker's and when exiting  about 10 minutes later, we could still see the orb.  also, during our viewing, i saw at least 2 airliner (jets) fly by...So commercial jets did have an opportunity to witness this object as well.  as far as making any noise...Neither of us heard anything.  eventually, i lost sight of the orb once i got to limonite and the sun was in my eyes...Making it too difficult to see at this point.  however, i do have to say, when i got home and looked at my photos something interesting appears.  remember, at the time, i saw only one object...And that is also noted in the first 19 second video; however, in my first still picture...There is a second object off to the right and when zoomed in you can see a very solid object and yet when i took my second still picture...The second object is gone.  we are talking literally seconds from picture to picture and i did not see or hear anything at the time.  yet for this object to be missing in the video and then in the first picture but not in the second picture it had to be traveling so fast that we just could not have seen it.  that is it.  so yes, i do have pictures and videos from different locations and i used trees, telephone poles, light poles and the mountain as reference points...So it can be verified.  i also did not erase them from my camera so if real scientist want to observe it and get the data from the original pictures and video they have that to reference as well.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo witnessed over mt.Rubidoux, riverside, ca for approximately 40 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the 51 freeway north bound at aprox. 8:45pm after work when i noticed in the sky 3 orange lights and an outline of a triangle with a black mass. the lights were at point to point of a triangle. as i was driving i was looking up as i felt like i passed underneath it. i couldn't pull over off the freeway so i exited off northern. i looked and i didn't see it anymore. i called a friend that lived in paradise valley and he also didn't see anything from his house over squaw peak mountain. i gave up and second guess on what i saw until i drove on northern rd west bound and i saw more orange lights in the far distance hovering and make a past east over downtown phoenix. i pulled into a residental road and saw another person pulled over pointing at the lights. i pulled up next to him and got out of the car and we both watched these lights over phoenix move east bound. at first there were three orange lights but the witness said a moment ago there were 4 lights but one went out. we than saw another orange light go out and only two remaining for about 1 1/2 until the final two orange lights both went out. they were not passing though a large object like a building or a mountain, they just turned off like a light switch and didn't reappear after that. final time of ending was 8:53 pm. please note that this was the same day of the solar eclipse.
content.summary: Triangle form with black mass and 3 distinctive orange lights hovering over freeway and second sighting over phoenix downtown

content.detailedDescription:
There was an annual air show at march afb last weekend. my wife, my son, and i hurried to catch the closing performance of the thunderbirds around 4:15p.M. on sunday may 20th. 

the show was due to end at 5:00 p.M. we intended to see what we could from a distance as not to become involved with an after-show traffic jam at the base.

about 4:20 p.M. we exited the north bound 215 freeway at ramona expressway and pulled onto a closed road, which led into an open field, to observe from a distance.

the thunderbirds were in action. six of them. they would fly in formation then break off from each other and perform spectacular flying maneuvers.

we stood aside our car and watched, as other cars and observers continued to join in, and park around us, to watch.

we were mesmerized and awe struck as time and time again the jets would fly over head, and around us, as the pilots re-aligned with each other for their next trick.

at one point 4 jets came at each other from the 4 points of the compass- then went vertical together- and once again headed back out towards the 4 points of the compass... their contrails were visible... and at great altitude they were. i would have to say well above 7,000 to 8,000 feet in altitude. and then i saw them.

at an even greater altitude above them i saw a fleet of at least 14-16 black spherical objects flying in a staggered but steady formation together, flying slowly in an east by south east direction above them.

i know what i saw. and i know how easy it is to lose sight of an aerial object in the bright blue sky. i am also familiar with dead skin cells floating atop the eyeball and causing visual distortion effects. prior to this i had tried to observe with my sunglasses on. my vision was clearer with out them. the sun was to the west at this moment. i had no glare to fight as i observed what i saw with the naked eye.

in my mind a fleet of black unidentified flying objects cruised slowly above the show, at extreme altitude, to make their presence known, as a show of force.

i yelled out to my wife wife, and my son, if they saw what i saw but their eyes were elsewhere, and their response was that my eyes "were playing tricks on me"...

i saw this distant, and distinct, black fleet around 4:45 p.M., above the air show, on sunday may 20th 2012----    and i just want to know if anyone else saw it!?

as the thunderbirds split into 4 different directions at high altitude, in the center, above them, higher up in the sky, i noticed this fleet. i can only say that the sighting lasted for maybe 10 seconds at the most-then they disappeared from view, and i could see them no longer.

did anyone else see what i saw that day? did the air force or norad have them on radar?

observer sun city, ca
content.summary: Thunderbird performance at march afb witnessed unknown fleet of black objects at extreme altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen a few ufos before but i have never considered reporting any of them until now because this time was so crazy. 
there was five of us outside when we noticed a huge, glowing orange orb floating from behind the trees and it appeared quite close to us. we considered for a second that because it was the may 24 weekend it was probably something from a firework, but very quickly it was extremely clear it couldn't have been. it came from the north and continued slowly along a straight path, then turned smoothly and went west, the direction we were facing in, into the distance until it was out of sight. it was in our sight for a little over a minute. 

upon observing these ufos, i had tears rolling down my face and spotting a ufo had never emotionally overwhelmed me like that. it was a strange feeling that i felt was neccessary to include.

about three or four minutes passed, and a second glowing orb comes from the exact same place but it was a bit closer, making it seem faster as well. it was orange and red, almost looking like a huge fireball. in the center of the orb however the ufo seemed to have a strange shape (almost like an hour glass/two triangles. it continued along the same straight path and then turned and went southwest until it was out of sight. 

the last orb that we spotted was the closest and it was bright red. it appeared about three or four minutes later also and it this one was b
very frightening. it had a wild glow to it that was extremely red, a bright mezmorizing red and then it began changing colours between yellow, orange, white, blue, violet and red. it was absolutely insane. it quickly continued along the same straight path headed directly south from the north like the others, and also like the others it turned but continued going northwest until it was past the clouds. 

they seemed to be below the clouds at first, and all three seemed to slowly go up after changing their paths. after the last one was out of sight, there was strange rumbling/roaring/nearly staticy noises that are very hard to explain. i felt scared for the rest of the night. there were no airplanes in the sky during the time of this spotting, but afterwards there were what appeared to be strange helicopters. (three or four with lights i had never seen before).
content.summary: Three orange and red orbs around 5 min. apart, last one very fast, close and bright

content.detailedDescription: I was talking on the phone and i was just looking at the sky and i saw a triangle shaped like object hovering in the sky emitting red light so i just became a little curious to know whats that then i just called my younger brother and he also noticed the same thing the object was moving back forth and spinning in the sky and i also called my sister and my friends over my house to see it.We all were just wondering if its something else or a ufo and then i also called my parents we all saw the weird action of that starlike thing moving in  a weird manner.I also tried to call some one from the news channel but we just wanted to confirm first
content.summary: A triangle shaped like star fluttering in the sky and emiting red and white light

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in the backyard at night when i saw what appeared to be an eagle shaped object, that was glowing orange, flying north to south, above me.  the object changed direction very quickly a few times.  at that point i started calling my friends over.  the first friend to show up asked what i wanted, i pointed to the object and said "look", we didn't know what we were looking at. the object did a few more acrobatics then flew out of sight.  at this point a few more friends showed up, they asked what we were doing, as we proceeded to tell them, 2 orbs, glowing the same orange colour appeared from the south where the eagle shape disappeared. the orbs were flying in an offset pattern and never broke that formation.  the were vibrating a little and going south to north.
when they vanished over the horizon, we all just looked at eachother not knowing what to think. about 15 seconds later, the orbs came back, going from north to south this time, their direction changed a few times and then they vanished over the horizon again.
we all agree that we don't know what the objects were, none of us has ever seen anything like it before. the objects were close but too bright to make out any detail.
content.summary: Flew above us and changed direction a few times.

content.detailedDescription: At about 9:10 p.M., i was sitting inside at the computer and looked out the window when i saw a reddish orange light that looked a bit unusual.  i thought might be a plane and dismissed it as such.  a few minutes later, i looked out again and saw two more of the same type of light traveling from about 75 degrees east and turned to continue north. seconds later, behind it were two more, traveling in same direction in parallel lines and then merging together.  i called someone to come and look at what i was seeing and we saw another two, then another, traveling behind in the same path.  the latter objects appeared to be a little larger and moved a bit more rapidly, almost looking like a fireball.  they did not continue in a straight line from east to west, but turned at about 7 degrees north and continued that route.  there was no noise and no blinking lights.  as i watched them come, one after the other, i kept saying "oh, my goodness..."  i tried to take some photos, but was too panicked to do so.  i have never ever seen anything like it, nor ever expected to see anything like it in my life.
content.summary: We witnessed 7 to 8 orange-red objects in flight, traveling from east and turning towards the north.  they did not come all at once, but one after another, some two at a time.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my room on facebook.
i live in the top floor, my house is on a hill.
i always got up and look from my window, so i noticed it at the moment i looked outside of my window.
as soon as i saw it, i called my roommate to check it out, he came and we watched it for several minutes.
it was standing still in the air, then started moving to south-southeast direction very very slowly, not ascended, not descended, just a straight line, then i lost it when it went behind the skyscaper (that is only a half a mile away from where i stand)
immediately i wrote it down on sirius ufo page in facebook and got response from another guy that saw it from bayramoglu/darica area (that is 25 miles away in south-southeast direction from where i stand) he told me that it was just like how i described. then i opened google map, and put a pin point to where my home was, then aimed to the skyscraper, and draw an approximate directional map on google maps, tried to find out where it can be according to my view angle.
content.summary: Star-like object, pulsating randomly just like a star, but shining yellow like a flame, not blue-white like a star

content.detailedDescription: Hello i am a avid sky watcher from lawrence massachusetts having seen multiple strange craft over the last 10 years not all in lawrence some in methuen and some over the line in salem nh and last night at dusk i observed a craft traveling southeast to northwest it was approx 500 ft of the ground and traveling at a slow steady pace it was in the shape of a blimp only about one quarter of the size with two dull white lights the two lights taking up almost the whole length of the craft the front light was stationary and non blinking the back light pulsated. no apparent wings and absolutely no noise what so ever!!!             and then at 10pm when i was going to pick up my daughter from work in a area with many people lots of lights and a lot of noise!!! i noticed two more white lights only these two lights were very bright and both stationary very low to the ground i got very excited with this craft it was just sitting there hovering the two lights were appeared to be connected to the same craft although the craft wasn't view-able the lights didn't give off or reflect light it bugged me that nobody else noticed it i guess that the occupants new that the area was a government hand-out latino area were nobody cares  about anything the craft took off in the blink of an eye and then stopped and hovered again for only about 5 seconds before taking off for good sorry i couldn't set up my camera fast enough
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Very bright white lights

content.detailedDescription: Me and 2 other friends went camping on the coast of maine , near the small town of cutler. we where camped out about 30 ft from a massive cliff over looking miles of nothing but miles and miles of ocean. there was nothing around us but woods and oceans. around 7pm we saw something strange. it looked like a sphere of intense light maybe 3-5 miles out in  the ocean. the light it was giving off was so intense we it cought our eyes from our camp spot in broad daylight it seemed almost like a spotlight. i myself passed it off as a boat or something as im kind of a skeptic to ufo's. about ten minutes later it disappeared. later that night around 11:00 another light appeared in the distance. we first thought it was a boat but it seemed to keep coming closer and closer. once we realized it was at our level of elevation same level with the cliff edge we knew it was no way a boat. it was almost dome like and intensely bright and mesmerizing. mostly emitted a white light but there where variations of green,red and orange lights around it. it also emitted no sound it was completely silent. we ran back to the car (5 miles through dark woods) once we started to leave we where followed by a strange black car just tailgated us for like 3 miles i dont know if this links to the lights but it was all very strange because we have camped here before and have never seen anybody near this area. its all just so odd i'm freaked out i don't know who to tell so i came here..
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Intense bright mesmerizing sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
Live away from city lights, love looking at the stars at night. magnolia, tx - saturday 05/19/2012 at around 9:20pm just happened to be looking at a star almost straight overhead but around 20deg due south. object was star distance away, not plane distance. object very small - size of pin head, then got around twice the size venus has been recently - around the size of a small marble, after about 1-2 seconds got small again,  size of pin head.
(at this point i thought i just saw a distant star blow up) but then it started moving due north to just past straight overhead. it moved much faster than a plane moves, and still at star distance but i would say it moved the 20deg in about 5-10 seconds. 

at this point i started to run in to get the wife and a camera but i didn't want to lose it in the sky so i turned around, looked back up and saw it move back to the south but lower in the sky - around 45deg. it went from due south - 45deg to horizon to due west 45deg to horizon in 1 to 2 seconds, during this time it appeared much larger, brighter and longer. appeared to still be at star distance, i think it looked longer because it moved so fast. 

then it slowed down again (so it got much smaller - pin head size), started moving north and slightly up in the sky, i lost it behind some trees and didn't see it again. 

at this point i was pretty excited - sprinted to get the wife, came back out, didn't see it again.

i've seen airplanes, helicopters, balloons, meteor showers, the space station and a number of shooting stars - this was none of those. this abruptly changed directions at least 4 times, changed size (closer/further away) at least 4 times. it also could have appeared to change size due to going faster/slower where going faster made it glow brigher thus appearing larger (easier to view).

haven't seen any other reports like this, can't believe i'm the only person that saw this but maybe just the first to report it. prior to this i didn't really believe in ufo's, i do now. with the distance and multiple changes in direction, this might be an experimental aircraft, but the speed it moved during some of the flight there's no way it is man made.

if i left some things out please ask in the comment section.. thanks.
content.summary: One ufo changed direction at least 4 times, appeared closer and further away multiple times

content.detailedDescription:
Six orange glowing lights in the sky over burbank, ca  5-20-12 at 8:45 pm pst

the six orange glowing lights came from the south (behind griffith park/forest lawn) and traveled across the sky westward slowly ascending until they appeared to be above toluca lake.  then each of the orange glowing lights rapidly ascended into the sky in an eastward direction.
content.summary: Six orange glowing lights in the sky over burbank, ca  5-20-12 at 8:45 pm pst

content.detailedDescription: This object appeared out of the day sky. it was so bright. it couldn't have been a star because the sun was still out and i couldn't even see venus. the object would dim every 30 seconds (estimated). it would go in and out of brightness. a commercial plan flew right by it but the object would loss its brightness as the plan flew by. when the plan was out of few the object would re-illuminate. there is no way anyone could have missed this. the brightness was just to much to be unnoticed. it moved slower than any craft that i have seen in my life. my whole family was there to see this thing.
content.summary: Very bright light that hovered over my house, then slowly moved across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Me and 2 other friends where camping in the middle of the woods of maine on a massive cliff edge. this was on the coast of maine. theres noting around us but ocean and woods. at around 7pm we saw was seemed to be a large sphere of intense light it was about 3-5 miles out in the ocean. i myself passed it off as a boat at the time. in about 15 minutes the light disappeared. at 11:00pm we were sitting around our came fire when one my friends pointed out a light in the distance again i just put off as a boat as i"m kinda a skeptic to ufo's but as this time it came closer and closer to the point when our camp sight went from dark to completely illuminated. as it hover directly to the cliff edge about 20-30 ft away from us. it came out to be sphere shaped emiting a strong white light with red and green lights around it's edges. but as close it was it was completely silent. we ran all the way be to our car 5 miles away from camp through dark woods. as soon we left we were followed for about 3 miles by a strange black car that was just tailgating us im not sure if this links to the strange light's but we have camped here before and have  never seen anyone out here until this night so its all  just very odd. i just dont know who to tell so i came here as i have never been to strong of a ufo believer well until now. im just freaked out..

(i have a video that will be posted soon of the 7pm sphere)
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.summary: Intense bright mezmerizing sphere.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10pm on 05-19-2012 i, along with another witness observed a white light in the sky and did not think much of it. after 5-10 minutes of driving up the highway, i again noticed this light parallel with our vehicle out the drivers side window , slightly higher than the trees.  another several minutes went by , and it became apparent that this object appeared to actually following us, keeping pace with us. for the next 10-15 minutes, i oberved this object at appoximately at the same elevation, maintain about the same speed as us,while remaing parallel to us outside the drivers side window (sometimes getting slightly ahead or behind us . at one point the object appear to be moving away from us , but still parallel and within a second or two it returned to the same distance that it had been from us the whole time.  at this point , i was sure this object was actually following us.  i directed the driver to pull over at the next rest area, we stopped and the object stopped (approx 1/4 -1/2 miles out our drivers side window and behind us)  we observed the object for a minute or two and began driving once again.  as soon as we continued driving , the object too started moving with us ,  again gaining a position parallel with us , on the drivers side.  for the next 5 minutes the object remain at our pace and roughly +/=  parallel with us.  as we approached our exit , the object appear to slow slightly and take a position over the highway , directly behind us.  once we exited the highway, we were now traveling perpendicular to the highway, at this time the object again was traveling at our speed , parallel with our vehicle , outside the drivers side windo. i did get a rather poor cell phone video at this time.  we travelled about 1/4 mile and again stopped,  the object again stopped with us. this time parallel with us and about the same distance as before, again we observed the object for a minute or two.  we again started driving and again , the object paced us.  we travelled to the next intersection, stopped at a light and lost sight of the obect behind a tree,  (again it appeared to stop with us , but this time out of sight behind a tree.  we turned left and again were travelling perpendicular to the road we were just on, after 5- 10 seconds the object was again visible, but this time , directly in front of us.  we travelled about 1/4 mile and turned right,  again the obect paced us and remained parallel outside the drivers side, we came upon an open field and stopped, again the object stopped. this time the object appeared red , rather than white as it appeared up until this point. it appeared to be roughly 1000- 2000 feet away at the tree line opposite the field and stationary at 100-300 feet in elevation.  i took several cell phone pictures.  again, rather poor , but pictures none the less.  we again observed the object for a couple minutes and began driving , again the object paced us as before .  we came to point in the road were it veered left ( about 1/4-1/2 miles from where we were previously stopped) once we came around the bend, we could see the object intermittently through the trees in front of us and to our left.  we reversed direction and drove back to the spot where we had just stopped at the field , this time the object did not follow us ,  instead it remained at the far corner of this field  roughly where we reversed direction. at this time it was maybe 1/2 mile away but hovering just above the trees.  and appeared to be getting lower.  we drove back and forth on this road a couple times and the object remained in the same spot, until on our last time driving back to the original place we stopped at the field,  the object appeared to be getting lower in elevation,  but did not appear to be getting further away, until we could no longer see it behind the trees.  we then drove back to the highway and the retraced the same route back to the field , but did not see the object again.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: An object followed me and another occupant of a vehicle from approx. 10:00-10:50pm over a distance of approx. 25 miles,  stopping three seperate times as we stopped
content.locationName: Cranston RI - N. Attlebor, Rhode Island

content.detailedDescription: I was out in front of my house taking out the trash. i decided to look up where i was watching the solar eclipse the evening of may 20, 2012 in portland, or. i looked up at 9:30pm, so completely dark/night, and saw this bright red light in the sky. it definitely was not an airplane. it was silent, moved slowly and mostly in a linear direction, but not always. i thought i was hallucinating at first because i had been looking at the sun, but that was several hours ago and so i checked my vision with many different objects and could see just fine and clearly. the lights changed in brightness, sometimes dimming a little. the light was mostly red, but had an orange tint to it. maybe there were more than one light. if so, it was really close to the others making it look like one big light to me. i couldn't believe what i was seeing, but nobody else was around to view it with me. i lost sight of the object when it went behind this large pine tree and behind my roof. it seemed to get smaller and fainter as if it were moving away.
content.summary: Reddish-orange light passing over se portland night of may 20.

content.detailedDescription: Our campsite was witness to this event. we witnessed a numerous number of lights in the night sky. this event was in pickstown south dakota at fort randall dam. i was fishing of the bank around 9:00pm on 5-17-12 and a storm front was moving in. just over the horizon 2 sets of orange orbs appear out of nowhere. the orbs were orange in color and appeared in a straight formation parallel to the horizon. they appeared only for a few seconds then disappeared. i tried to get the images on my camera and it was unsuccessful. 15 mins later a squadron of jet fighters circled the area and look like the were sweeping the area around the sight. at first, we thought it was military training activities with flares. the more i thought about it, flares don't stay stationary. or do they? i also believe that the military would not be flying 15 or more jets in this sortie.
content.summary: Orange orbs that appeared in front of a storm cloud

content.detailedDescription: 3 friends and i were sitting on clearwater beach,when i looked up and saw what appeared to be a glowing disk shaped object. it was glowing orange,but put off no other light. almost like fire that didn't produce light. it looked as if it was going to crash into the ocean,because it kept hovering closer and closer,than would stop and stay in place. after watching it for 3 minutes,it began moving to the right like a airplane,but there were no lights,no wings etc and was still glowing orange. we then began to film it,and it began moving in a wobble like a helicopter, and was we were watching it,red lights appeared on the bottom,it broke into 2 separate objects, that appeared to be airplanes and went their separate ways. my first reaction of seeing it looked as if something were crashing into the ocean,i was frightened,but then as i watch it,i couldnt figure out what it was so i stood in place until i grasped the reality of what i was watching.I couldnt take my eyes off of it. it didnt take my eyes off of it until it broke in two and obtained an "airplane" disguise.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 friends and i saw a glowing object on clearwater beach,observed for 15 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: 3 friends and i were sitting on clearwater beach,when i looked up and saw what appeared to be a glowing disk shaped object. it was glowing orange,but put off no other light. almost like fire that didn't produce light. it looked as if it was going to crash into the ocean,because it kept hovering closer and closer,than would stop and stay in place. after watching it for 3 minutes,it began moving to the right like a airplane,but there were no lights,no wings etc and was still glowing orange. we then began to film it,and it began moving in a wobble like a helicopter, and was we were watching it,red lights appeared on the bottom,it broke into 2 separate objects, that appeared to be airplanes and went their separate ways. my first reaction of seeing it looked as if something were crashing into the ocean,i was frightened,but then as i watch it,i couldnt figure out what it was so i stood in place until i grasped the reality of what i was watching.I couldnt take my eyes off of it. it didnt take my eyes off of it until it broke in two and obtained an "airplane" disguise.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 friends and i saw a glowing object on clearwater beach,observed for 15 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Out on deck when other witness says "ufo!" so i look up and observe three soft white lights spaced approximately the thickness of your thumb at arms length .I also looked closely to judge it as one solid object and it was so fast yet made absolutely no sound.I looked for about three seconds before trees blocked view & i estimate it crossed entire sky in 7 to 10 seconds.
content.summary: Triangular 3 soft white lights silent

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and i were sitting on our balcony in albir, spain on sunday may 20, 2012 just after 9 pm. the skies were clear and there was no wind. i watched a bright object coming from the mountains on what i would guess  2-3 miles altitude. sometimes it was moving from left to right, slowly and most of the time it was almost still/not moving.
after a couple of minutes it started to move east (towards us) and after a minute or two it took off almost straight up and it looked like it accelerated to enormous speed  instantly and it went smaller and smaller and disappeared in about 3 seconds.
we can not tell the size of this as we do not know the altitude. the colour as we saw it was almost glowing (red /orange) and the light was consistent.
it took off at a small angle so we had some kind of speed impression as opposed to just leaving us in a straight line.
i have never believed in this before and i do not know if i do now but this is the most inexplicable thing i have ever seen.
content.summary: Slow flying bright object accelrating into space

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning home to chicago, from dc, on an amtrak train, capitol 29, that i've used many times. i was awake as the train pulled into the station at cleveland, ohio. it was early sunday morning, may 20th, about 2:30 am when the train stopped. i looked out the window only to see a number of ufos, seen as white orbs, as many as 8 at one time. the sky was clear with no clouds. they were circling around a skyscraper, near the top which ended with a pyramid type tower and a spire. i was totally lucid, wondering what they were as they encircled the spire, moving in different directions, blinking out, then re-appearing. they changed directions, almost as if they were drawing from the energy from a pulsating light on the top. at first, it looked like swarms of insects that would be attracted to light. then, i thought it might be a flock of birds. on top of the spire was ball of light that they seemed to be "playing" with. as the train remained at the station for almost 30 minutes, i watched them for almost as long. it was almost as if they were enjoying the chance to make themselves known. they would move in a swarm, then back away with some disappearing.                                                                                                                                                                          

when i got home, i checked out ufo sightings in cleveland, and found that this is a common occurence that was brought to attention by a tv station a few years ago. it's the key building where i remember seeing a large lighted key as an insignia. it was way too high and distant for these orbs to be be insects, birds or other phenomena. 

i am a member of a mufon group in chicago, so i am very skeptical of these sightings, but this is something that remains a mystery for me. i looked at other skyscrapers in the vicinity, but saw nothing. it seems that this particular building has attracted them in the past. in my opinion, this was a ufo sighting. i took a picture with my cell phone which only showed the lighted tower in the distance.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufos over a building in cleveland ohio

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my backyard facing west and from behind the tree that was blocking our view we saw 5-6 grey-ish objects flying silently through the sky. at first i thought they were geese??..Lol realizing not at night and no flapping wings they def. weren't geese. they went from south to north fast, smooth and quite. if i had to say what they looked like i would say boeings prototype x-45c. my wife and i were confused and amazed...What the hell was that...We kept saying.
content.summary: 5 silent triangles not high enough to be planes..Creepy

content.detailedDescription: In aptos cali. with my girlfriend on our way we noticed what seemed to resemble a fire burning in the sky. so i instanly took the time and date and watched as it overed back and forth and stop then zoomed to the right and dimmed out and disapeared before our eyes... i myself have sighting all the time that cannot be explain other than ufo, but my gf had not so me telling her about it all the time and her seing by me was cool cuz she burst up crying and i was like there you go. it was an amazing sighting one of my best to date. i knew instantly it was the real deal.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw it with my gf on our way home. ive seen lots of stuff like this but this was her first and she instanly was crying it just dissapeared infront of our eyes

content.detailedDescription: We were out on the cottage deck and wondered what a star was doing so close to the horizon and so bright at 10:10. we observed the ufo as it began to move slightly up and down, left and right which we found odd. over the next 20 minutes we pondered what it could be but it was very unique. it even changed in color to a red light and purple at distance but predominantly stayed white and dimmed, blinked, and pulsates for a wry king time. after the movements became quite noticable we felt confused and there was fear a bit. it then proceeded to the distance and even appeard to disappear in a cloud of smoke before reappearing again and then descending below the tree horizon. after the event there were lots of helicopters directly over us with search lights on and was very disturbing for this small town.
content.summary: Near horizon, looked like a star but then began moving, blinking, changing color, and strange deviation.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving along veterans memorial highway when i saw about 8 strongly glowing orange orbs in the sky. i am used to seeing planes fly over in to islip but these were higher than the planes in the usually flight path to land and were moving in all kinds of directions at a high rate of speed for their distance and altitude. some were brighter than the others and all same blinking lights. i had never seen anything like it. it caught my attention right away because it looked so different than the usual planes in the area. some other people stopped to look on as well. i looked online and there were the same orange orbs reported in brooklyn the same night.
content.summary: About 8 very bright orange orbs that also had blinking triangular lights moving around long island sky near islip airport.
